official_title: A joint resolution to designate June 14, 1987, as "Baltic Freedom Day", and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designates June 14, 1987, as Baltic Freedom Day. Expresses disapproval of the refusal of the U.S.S.R. to recognize the sovereignty of the Baltic Republics.

titles.title: A joint resolution to designate June 14, 1987, as "Baltic Freedom Day", and for other purposes.
